text: The Alicyclobacillaceae are a family of gram-positive bacteria. Some of them are thermophiles, they can live at around . They also tolerate acidic pH levels of 1.5â€“5.5. They can make endospores. Alicyclobacillaceae are found in soil, water and in geothermal springs. == References == George Garrity (hrsg.): Bergey's manual of systematic bacteriology, Volume 3: The low G+C Gram Positives. 2. Auflage. Springer-Verlag, New York u. a. O. 2008, . Category:Gram-positive bacteria
title: Alicyclobacillaceae
